CVE_data_meta.TITLE: GlobalProtect App: File race condition vulnerability leads to local privilege escalation during upgrade

description_data.value:
A race condition vulnerability Palo Alto Networks GlobalProtect app on Windows allows a local limited Windows user to execute programs with SYSTEM privileges.
This issue can be exploited only while performing a GlobalProtect app upgrade.

solution.value: This issue is fixed in GlobalProtect app 5.0.10, GlobalProtect app 5.1.4, and all later GlobalProtect app versions.

credit.value: Palo Alto Networks thanks Rich Mirch of TeamARES from Critical Start Inc for discovering and reporting this issue.
